name: Lil' Bugventures
description:
Isabellabug is a lil' ladybug in a big world! Go on a cozy little adventure through a world of nature, grow some helpful plants and meet some new people!

A short casual experience about exploration and plants. Average playtime is about 10 to 25 minutes.

Part of the Care Package Bundle! With help from Gregory Lee! All proceeds support an LGBT Developer!
